name: GCP SQL MySQL DB instance point-in-time recovery backup (Binary logs) is not enabled
description: This policy identifies Cloud SQL MySQL DB instances whose point-in-time recovery backup is not enabled. In case of an error, point-in-time recovery helps you recover an instance to a specific point in time. It is recommended to enable automated backups with point-in-time recovery to prevent any data loss in case of an unwanted scenario.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name='gcloud-sql-instances-list' AND json.rule='$.settings.backupConfiguration.binaryLogEnabled is false and $.databaseVersion contains MYSQL'
recommendation:
Follow the below mentioned URL to enable point-in-time recovery backup (Binary logs) for the reported MySQL instance:

https://cloud.google.com/sql/docs/mysql/backup-recovery/pitr
compliance.standard: Australian Cyber Security Centre (ACSC) Essential Eight
Australian Energy Sector Cyber Security Framework (AESCSF)
New Zealand Information Security Manual (NZISM v3.4)
